Global rules and requirements\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Intellectual Property inside all EPAM Projects is managing with respect to 'Asset Management Guideline', 'IT Security' and 'Data Privacy WIGLO'.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Links:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Asset Management Guideline -  \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/index.aspx/Policy/Parent%20Pages/Security.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/index.aspx/Policy/Parent%20Pages/Security.aspx\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pal.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IT Security  – \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/index.aspx/Policy/Parent%20Pages/Security.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/index.aspx/Policy/Parent%20Pages/Security.aspx\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data Privacy WIGLO \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pal.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"- ht\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/index.aspx/Policy/Parent%20Pages/Security.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"tps://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/index.aspx/Policy/Parent%20Pages/Security.aspx\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All NBCU projects' assets are classified according to EPAM rules.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Rules and requirements on Program level\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"NBCU Intellectual Property (NBCU IP) have to be managed according to contract requirements.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"NBCU IP is defined as any and all Deliverables, work product or results of Services and inventions, innovations, discoveries, designs, plans, models, prototypes, computer programs (including source and object code and documentation), know-how, techniques and specifications that are conceived, created, developed or discovered directly or indirectly as part of or in connection with any work performed for NBCUniversal or on behalf of NBCUniversal.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Intellectual Property may belong to NBCUniversal, Vendor or to a third party. Intellectual Property, which belongs to NBCUniversal, is clearly defined on Program level.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Unless otherwise explicitly declared by EPAM and agreed with NBCUniversal, any IP that may be used, developed or conceived while working on a NBCUniversal engagement shall be treated as NBCUniversal's property.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM shall ensure that any identification of a potential IP is notified to NBCUniversal immediately and appropriate action taken to classify and protect such IP.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM ensures that any and all rights on work, which is done by EPAM resources, is assigned to NBCUniversal.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Such assignment of rights is carried out at the end of Task Orders, which are explicitly stated by Business. In all other cases, such assignment shall be done on:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Annual basis for all the work carried out from the last assignment date/start date in NBCUniversal  to current date; and/or\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At EPAM Off-boarding point, if the resource is being off-boarded from NBCUniversal\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All such assignments shall be duly verified and validated for accuracy and completeness by the appropriate authorized signatory of the EPAM and signed off\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM shall ensure that all such IP are fully documented, classified as NBCUniversal Restricted and treated as per the classification guidelines for such data.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Any use/re-production/sharing (in any form) of such an IP shall not be permitted without the explicit written approval of the NBCUniversal Legal (facilitated by NBCUniversal Vendor Management Office)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Any proposed use of third party IP or Vendor IP shall be declared upfront and clearance must be obtained from NBCUniversal Legal/Security team (facilitated by NBCUniversal Vendor Management Office) for use of such of IP in deliverables to NBCUniversal\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Prior to use of EPAM IP or third party IP on NBCUniversal deliverables, EPAM shall ensure verification of the scope and terms of USE. Such terms and scope shall be clearly agreed upon and signed off by all parties involved\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In cases where Joint IP Development is undertaken by Vendor with NBCUniversal and/or with other third parties, Vendor  shall ensure that the scope and terms of IP development, rights for use are discussed, documented and complied with\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM shall educate its resources on proper treatment of IP and ensure that norms around IP use are complied with. Any violations of IP (NBCUniversal/ Vendor /third party) shall be treated as a critical incident and handled appropriately\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
